stepItems.title: How happy are you with the work completed?

description:
Top Half Requirements

  1. First Top Header: want this to be a fairly thin TEAL (not coral) with text centered in the header where I can update the text to whatever I want at any given time.
  2. Second Top Header: Want this to be a thicker translucent NAVY border. Want logo in upper LEFT hand corner. Want the ""SHOP"", ""OUR STORY"", ""BLOG"" and CONTACT"" text as is in the mock up. They will all be linked to separate pages. Keep the Log in, Search and Check Out Icons as is. Want the header to move with the user as they scroll down the page.
  3. Top 1/2 of homepage: will be 2-3 sliding pictures (example of one picture and format for top half to the right). Keep the text formatting as is. Want each sliding page to act as a "button" that will be linked to other pages (either SHOP, OUR STORY). For this example, this page would link to the OUR STORY page. Want to add arrows for the user to scroll through each slide. Want to add a pop up in the lower right hand corner which has my social media information linked and when you click on it, it opens up another tab in your browser. Use the same icons we did on the password / landing page. Text is to match the rest of the page. Want the pop up to be translucent so you are still able to see the background water picture, but do not want the icons to be translucent. Want the user

Bottom Half Requirements

  1. Top border that moves with user as you scroll down: Want that same navy border from up top to move with the user as the scroll down the page.
  2. Add to side by side pictures: Want to get rid of the white space I have now and add two graphics with text overlay (as buttons) just like the slide pages.
  3. Footer: Want the footer to match the TEAL from the top border. Basically just mimic what's here. Want to add social media icons as well that are linked to my pages. Contact us, Size Chart, Terms & Conditions / Privacy are all other linked pages.
title: Home page changes okaicos.com (copy)
